SELECT * FROM weather_table WHERE
fcstDate = #{fcstDate} AND fcstTime = #{fcstTime}

select * from weather_table
where TIMESTAMPDIFF( hour , CONCAT( date_format(fcstDate, '%Y-%m-%d') , ' ' , CONCAT( substr(fcstTime, 1, 2 ) , ':' , SUBSTR(fcstTime, 3, 2) ) ) , now() ) < 0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF( hour , concat( date_format(fcstDate, '%Y-%m-%d') , ' ' , CONCAT( SUBSTR(fcstTime, 1, 2 ) , ':' , SUBSTR(fcstTime, 3, 2) ) ) , now() ) > -24 ;
